# uptimekuma_notification_brevo (Data Source)

Get Brevo notification information by ID or name

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up an existing Brevo notification by name
data "uptimekuma_notification_brevo" "example" {
  name = "Brevo Email Alerts"
}

# Look up by ID
data "uptimekuma_notification_brevo" "by_id" {
  id = 1
}

# Use with a monitor resource
resource "uptimekuma_monitor_http" "api" {
  name             = "API Monitor"
  url              = "https://api.example.com/health"
  notification_ids = [data.uptimekuma_notification_brevo.example.id]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
- `name` (String) Notification name
